short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix WebAssign.net's bad UI, auto-scrolling, and other issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feature list:
 - adds new dark/light mode styles
 - collapsable questions to save space
 - speed ups for page reload time
 - stops glitchy scrolling on submit
 - general improvements
